Server Module
[eProsima RPCDDS API Reference]

This group contains related API to create a server application. Except the custom server's strategies, this API is used by the tool rpcddsgen to generate custom code based in a defined interface. That interface and its remote procedure have to be defined in IDL language. More...

Collaboration diagram for Server Module:

Classes

class  eprosima::rpc::server::Server
 This class implements the common functionalities that any server has. More...

 This class is the base of all classes that implement a server strategy. that could be used by the server. More...

 This class is the base of all classes that implement a server strategy. that could be used by the server. More...

Modules

 Strategies
 

Server's strategies that can be used in the server application. These strategies define how the server schedules a incoming request.


Detailed Description

This group contains related API to create a server application. Except the custom server's strategies, this API is used by the tool rpcddsgen to generate custom code based in a defined interface. That interface and its remote procedure have to be defined in IDL language.

Generated on 29 Aug 2014 for eProsima RPCDDS C++ API by  1.6.1
